messages.title: A Strong Voice for Erewash
messages.content: Maggie has a strong track record of delivering for Erewash and as your MP, she will continue to work tirelessly to ensure our community remains a great place to live, work and raise a family.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Maggie will work with Theresa May to deliver a strong economy and ensure a Brexit that works for Erewash.

issues.brexitEurope: Maggie will work with Theresa May to ensure a Brexit that works for Erewash.
issues.economy: Maggie supports efforts to strengthen the economy.

leaflet.personalStatement: Maggie has a track record of standing up for Erewash and will continue to fight for the interests of the community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Maggie has a strong track record of delivering for Erewash.

endorsements.endorsement: Theresa May supports Maggie Throup, noting her as a strong candidate.

quotes.text: The risks of getting it wrong are too big to take.

images.caption: Maggie Throup standing with Theresa May
